Uses of Package
org.pepstock.charba.client.geo

  • Packages that use org.pepstock.charba.client.geo 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.geo
    Contains all classes to activate the GEO controllers (AKA chartjs-chart-geo.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.geo.callbacks
    Contains all callbacks to configure the GEO controllers.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.gwt.widgets
    Contains all charts classes wrapped as GWT widget in order to enable to use inside to GWT UIBinder.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.geo used by org.pepstock.charba.client.geo 
    Class Description
    BaseGeoChart
    This is the base chart definition for GEO charts.
    BaseGeoController
    Controller implementation to create charts like choropleth and bubbleMap.
    BaseGeoOptions
    Base options for GEO charts.
    BaseGeoOptions.InternalOptionsWrapper
    Internal object to map the options of GEO chart and get the NativeObject.
    BaseGeoOptions.RemappedOptionsFactory
    Can create a options mapper in order to re-map the CHART.JS options where needed in order to add additional properties and nodes for GEO charts.
    BubbleMapDataPoint
    Used for BubbleMap data sets to set the data to render.
    A data has to have a latitude and longitude properties and a value property containing the value for the coloring.
    BubbleMapDataPoint.BubbleMapDataPointFactory
    Creates BubbleMapDataPoint form a NativeObject.
    BubbleMapDataPoint.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    BubbleMapDataset
    It is a BubbleDataset with additional options for bubble map charts.
    BubbleMapDataset.BubbleMapDataPointFactory
    Factory to create a data point from a native object, used for array container lists.
    BubbleMapOptions
    Specific options for bubble map chart.
    ChoroplethDataPoint
    Used for GEO data sets to set the data to render.
    A GEO data has to have a feature property containing the feature to render and a value property containing the value for the coloring.
    ChoroplethDataPoint.ChoroplethDataPointFactory
    Creates ChoroplethDataPoint form a NativeObject.
    ChoroplethDataPoint.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    ChoroplethDataset
    The choropleth data set allows a region definition (by Feature) and specific value to be specified.
    ChoroplethDataset.ChoroplethDataPointFactory
    Factory to create a data point from a native object, used for array container lists.
    ChoroplethOptions
    Specific options for choropleth chart.
    ColorAxis.ColorAxisRemappedOptionsFactory
    Can create a options mapper in order to re-map the CHART.JS options where needed in order to add additional properties and nodes for GEO charts.
    ColorAxisMapper
    The coloring of the nodes will be done with a special color scale.
    Provides the elements, as colored legend, which can provide the how the values are distributed on map.
    ColorAxisMapper.Property
    Name of properties of native object for projection scale.
    ColorAxisMapper.ProxyInterpolateCallback
    Java script FUNCTION callback called to interpolate the color on GEO chart.
    CommonOptionsHandler
    Handles the common properties to configure GEO data set and options.
    CommonOptionsHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Coordinates
    Contains the latitude and longitude, calculated by BaseGeoChart.projectionInvert(CoordinatesPoint) and BaseGeoChart.projectionInvert(double, double).
    CoordinatesPoint
    Contains the coordinates X and Y on the canvas, calculated by BaseGeoChart.projection(Coordinates) and BaseGeoChart.projection(double, double).
    DataPointCenter
    This class enables the capability to specify the coordinates where the tooltip should appear.
    DataPointCenter.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Feature
    Represents the region definition with all properties and geometries needed to draw the region.
    Feature.FeatureFactory
    Creates Feature object from a native object.
    Feature.Properties
    Internal mapper of java script object at "properties" name space of a feature.
    This is not expose in order to reduce the complexity fo rthe user to access to those data.
    Feature.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    GeoControllerResource
    Contains the content of chartjs-chart-geo.min.js to inject.
    GeoDataPoint
    Used for GEO data sets to set the data to render.
    A GEO data has to have a value property containing the value for the coloring.
    GeoDataPoint.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    GeoDatasetHandler
    This is the options handler for data set implementation for GEO charts.
    GeoDatasetHandler.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    GeoExtendedChartType
    This is a fake controller in order to set it as extended chart type for GEO charts.
    GeoFeatureElement
    Calling some methods on your chart instance passing an argument of an event, will return the elements at the event position.
    The geoFeature elements are mapped by this object.
    GeoFeatureElement.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    GeoFeatureElementOptions
    The styling of the new element GeoFeatureElementOptions is based on Bar element with some additional options for the outline and graticule.
    GeoFeatureElementOptions.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Graticule
    The network of intersecting lines of latitude and longitude is called the graticule.
    It is imaginary on the earth, of course, but is drawn on globes and maps for reference.
    The graticule of latitude and longitude lines is an angular measurement system.
    Graticule.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    HasCommonOptions
    Maps all options which are common between GEO options and dataset.
    IsColorAxis
    The coloring of the nodes will be done with a special color scale.
    Provides the elements, as colored legend, which can provide the how the values are distributed on map.
    IsGeoDataset
    This is the base data set implementation for GEO charts.
    IsLegendAxis
    Base scale for color and size axes, needed for GOE charts implementation.
    It contains all options needed to configure the scale with a legend.
    IsSizeAxis
    The scale is used to map the values to symbol radius size.
    Provides the elements, as colored legend, which can provide the how the values are distributed on map.
    JsGeoHelper
    Internal utility for GEo charts to invoke ChartGeo.topojson utility provided by the controller package.
    TopoJson is packaged with this plugin to convert data, it is exposed as in the global context.
    Legend
    Legend configuration for GEO chart scale.
    Legend.Property
    Name of properties of native object for projection scale.
    LegendAxisMapper
    Base scale for color and size axes, needed for GOE charts implementation.
    It contains all options needed to configure the scale with a legend.
    LegendAxisMapper.Property
    Name of properties of native object for projection scale.
    Margin
    Defines the margin pixels for legend such that it doesn't stick to the edge of the chart .
    Margin.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    Padding  
    PositionPoint
    This object is wrapping the native java script object to provide the position of the legend.
    ProjectionAxis.ProjectionAxisRemappedOptionsFactory
    Can create a options mapper in order to re-map the CHART.JS options where needed in order to add additional properties and nodes for GEO charts.
    ProjectionAxisMapper
    A map projection is a way to flatten a globe's surface into a plane in order to make a map.
    This requires a systematic transformation of the latitudes and longitudes of locations from the surface of the globe into locations on a plane.
    This is the scale which is managing the map projection.
    ProjectionAxisMapper.Property
    Name of properties of native object for projection scale.
    SizeAxis.SizeAxisRemappedOptionsFactory
    Can create a options mapper in order to re-map the CHART.JS options where needed in order to add additional properties and nodes for GEO charts.
    SizeAxisMapper
    The scale is used to map the values to symbol radius size.
    Provides the elements, as colored legend, which can provide the how the values are distributed on map.
    SizeAxisMapper.Property
    Name of properties of native object for projection scale.
    TopoJson
    TopoJSON is an extension of GeoJSON that encodes topology.
    TopoJson.Objects
    Maps the objects node of topojson definition.
    It contains all Feature needed to draw the GEO chart.
    TopoJson.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.geo used by org.pepstock.charba.client.geo.callbacks 
    Class Description
    Feature
    Represents the region definition with all properties and geometries needed to draw the region.
  • Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.geo used by org.pepstock.charba.client.gwt.widgets 
    Class Description
    BubbleMapChart
    A Bubble Map, as known as Proportional Symbol is used to render maps with dots that are scaled according to some numerical value.
    It is based on a regular bubble chart where the positioning is done using latitude and longitude to create a legend for the different radi.
    BubbleMapDataset
    It is a BubbleDataset with additional options for bubble map charts.
    BubbleMapOptions
    Specific options for bubble map chart.
    ChoroplethChart
    A choropleth chart is used to render maps with the area filled according to some numerical value.
    ChoroplethDataset
    The choropleth data set allows a region definition (by Feature) and specific value to be specified.
    ChoroplethOptions
    Specific options for choropleth chart.
    Coordinates
    Contains the latitude and longitude, calculated by BaseGeoChart.projectionInvert(CoordinatesPoint) and BaseGeoChart.projectionInvert(double, double).
    CoordinatesPoint
    Contains the coordinates X and Y on the canvas, calculated by BaseGeoChart.projection(Coordinates) and BaseGeoChart.projection(double, double).
